name: Bharat Kisan Unnati Yojana
description: Our company is committed to the prosperity of farmers through the Bharat Kisan Unnati Yojana, providing financial support to eligible farmer families.
eligibility: Open to small and marginal farmers owning less than 2 hectares of land. Valid Aadhaar number and linked bank account required. Self-declaration of land ownership not exceeding 2 hectares.

name: Krishi Samarthan Yojana
description: Supporting the backbone of our nation, the Krishi Samarthan Yojana aims to uplift farmers by providing financial assistance through our organization.
eligibility: Available for small and marginal farmers with landholding below 2 hectares. Aadhaar and a linked bank account are mandatory. Self-declaration of land ownership not exceeding 2 hectares is required.

name: Samruddhi Kisan Sahay Yojana
description: Our organization introduces the Samruddhi Kisan Sahay Yojana, a dedicated initiative to provide financial aid to eligible farmer families for their well-being.
eligibility: Open to small and marginal farmers owning less than 2 hectares of land. Valid Aadhaar number and linked bank account required. Self-declaration of land ownership not exceeding 2 hectares.

name: Sahayata Krishi Samriddhi Yojana
description: In our commitment to the agricultural community, we present the Sahayata Krishi Samriddhi Yojana, offering financial support to eligible farmers across the country.
eligibility: Available for small and marginal farmers with landholding below 2 hectares. Aadhaar and a linked bank account are mandatory. Self-declaration of land ownership not exceeding 2 hectares is required.

name: Krishi Kalyan Samridhi Yojana
description: The Krishi Kalyan Samridhi Yojana is our initiative to promote the well-being of farmers by providing financial assistance to eligible farmer families.
eligibility: Open to small and marginal farmers owning less than 2 hectares of land. Valid Aadhaar number and linked bank account required. Self-declaration of land ownership not exceeding 2 hectares.

name: Kisan Suraksha Yojana
description: Our organization is proud to present the Kisan Suraksha Yojana, offering financial security to eligible farmer families as a part of our commitment to agriculture.
eligibility: Available for small and marginal farmers with landholding below 2 hectares. Aadhaar and a linked bank account are mandatory. Self-declaration of land ownership not exceeding 2 hectares is required.
